def OnAssociarExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CP_CATALOGOSFORNECIMENTO")) command.TransitoryVars.Add("HANDLECATALOGO", item.Handle)
